name: @elpete/gitlab-npm-audit-parser
description: NPM Audit parser for GitLab dependency scanning

scripts.test: npm run test:v1 && npm run test:v2
scripts.test:v1: cat test/v1_report.json | ./parse.js -o GL-report.1.json && diff -q GL-report.1.json test/snapshot/GL-report.1.json && echo success!; rm GL-report.1.json
scripts.test:v2: cat test/v2_report.json | ./parse.js -o GL-report.2.json && diff -q GL-report.2.json test/snapshot/GL-report.2.json && echo success!; rm GL-report.2.json

author: Maxime Gibeau
